title: VR-Based Marine Ecology Exploration and Environmental Problem-Solving Project for Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Marine Ecology and Environmental Science Knowledge, Basic VR Equipment Operation Skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe the structure of marine ecosystems and interactions among organisms in a 3D space through VR simulations.
Learners can convert marine pollution data collected in virtual reality environments into mathematical graph models to analyze correlations in environmental changes.
Learners can derive mathematical cost-benefit analyses of marine conservation policies with over 80% accuracy while solving VR game-based tasks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
